content: get dishes clean with this power-packed little kitchen puff stitched in 100% cotton lily sugar n cream this absorbent crochet scrubbie is super-easy to make working in rounds you ll practice chains half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 together and more create a bunch in different colors and give them away they make a great small gift that will cheer up any clean-up materials lily® sugar n cream® scrub off™ 2 6 oz/75 g 106 yds/97 m papaya 90014 or greens 90015 or spring blue 90016 1 ball or 30 yds/27 5 m note 1 ball makes 4 puffs
